title: Manage a Post-Closing Issue
description: A week after closing, a buyer discovers a latent defect (e.g., a hidden leak) that was not disclosed. They contact their agent for help.

tasks.description: Advise the buyer to document the issue thoroughly with photos and repair estimates.
tasks.expected_outcome: The buyer gathers evidence of the defect and its repair cost.

tasks.description: Review the seller's property disclosure statement to see if the issue should have been disclosed.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent determines if there was a potential failure to disclose.

tasks.description: Advise the buyer on their potential recourse, such as contacting the seller to request they cover the repair cost, and recommend they consult with a real estate attorney.
tasks.expected_outcome: The agent provides guidance and recommends legal counsel for a post-closing dispute.
